title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Tuesday 22 September 2015 - BBC News
summary: a former teacher at brooke weston academy in corby has been arrested on sus of the possession of indecent images of children .
a gasification plant in corby has been granted approval by the county council .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from the team on local live today .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for beds , herts and bucks .

documents.title: northampton school celebrates 100 years of education
text: today marks 100 years since the doors ofnorthampton school for girls first opened .
students both past and present gathered for a. were treated to afternoon tea , and dozens of pupils competed in a centenary bake-off .

documents.title: lakelands hos founder 'proud ' of its work
text: one of the founders of lakelands hos in corby says he 's proud of the work and service offered to patients and family members .
vic hardy co-founded the hos with jean clarke in 1988 .
this week there is a special fundraising and awareness drive in the town to highlight the work being done by the hos
author: John Griff
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: james delingpole : 'dave 's reputation enhanced by smoking cannabis '
text: journalist james delingpole has told bbc radio northampton he smoked cannabis with david cameron when they were both studying at oxford .
mr delingpole , who lives near daventry , spoke to me earlier and said : `` i think this is the perfect non-scandal .
yes , it 's interesting , but it 's not going to do anyone 's reputation any damage .
if anything it will enhance dave 's reputation . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: awareness week highlights the work of corby hos
text: all this week , people across corby are organising events to raise funds for lakelands hos
i spent the afternoonhere , learning all about the hos its patients , staff and supporters .
people have risen to the fundraising challenge , and have been hosting all kinds of events , from cake sales to social dances .
author: John Griff
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: tonight 's news headlines : gasification plant an economy boost former corby teacher arrested on indecent images charge
text: tonight 's news headlines : gasification plant an economy boost former corby teacher arrested on indecent images charge
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: corby gasification plant : 'no cause for air quality concern '
text: the development consultants behind a gasification plant in corby , given the go ahead today , say there 's no evidence air quality will be compromised .
leona quigley , from iceni projects , said : `` the planning application was supported by a full air quality analysis , that demonstrates the proposed facility will not have any adverse impacts . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: university of northampton project aims to change secondary school sport
text: the university of northampton 's institute of health and wellbeing has won a £ 75,000 research bid to evaluate a groundbreaking new project which aims to change physical activity in secondary schools .
more information on the project can be found on the university 's website .

documents.title: concerns as gasification in corby gets approved
text: those against the gasification plant in corby - which was approved by northamptonshire county councillors earlier today - say they question the safety of turning waste into electricity .
campaigner lee forster , who had previously set up a protest camps near the site , and others said they were also concerned about an increasing number of lorries on the roads .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: parents alerted to arrest of former corby teacher
text: police are continuing their enquiries after a former teacher from brooke weston academy in corby was arrested on sus of the possession of indecent images of children .
in a letter to parents , which was later posted on facebook , the school said he is a former member of the senior leadership team .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: former corby teacher arrested
text: in a letter alerting parents of pupils at brooke weston academy in corby to news a former teacher has been arrested on sus of possessing indecent images of children , the head teacher and chairman of governors at the school say they are `` shocked and saddened '' .
northamptonshire police say a 40-year-old man , formerly from corby , was arrested in august and has been released on police bail .
enquiries are continuing .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: litter fines issued by northampton borough council
text: northampton borough council 's neighbourhood wardens have issued 16 people with £ 80 fines as part of its 'love northampton - let 's keep it clean ' campaign .
the recipients were fined for refusing to up their litter .

documents.title: corby gasification plant : 'waste will come from london , high wycombe , grantham , loughborough '
text: campaigners against a gasification plant in corby which was given the go-ahead by northamptonshire county councillors earlier , say they 're concerned corby could now take waste from towns 90 miles away .
helen fursdon , who lives near the plant and spoke at the meeting , said : `` it 's not appropriate or fair that corby should deal with waste from outside of the county . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants dog to help sniff out declining species
text: harvest mice are hard to find , but its hoped a northamptonshire sniffer dog will help with a study into the species ' decline .

tui the retriever is being trained by moulton college researcher emily howard williams , who hopes he will be able to identify the mice when presented with samples gathered from potential nest sites .
the training is funded by the people 's trust for endangered species .
author: Helen Burchell
BBC News Online

documents.title: northamptonshire sniffer dog trained in mouse detection
text: a dog is being trained to sniff out mice as part of a wildlife conservation project based at moulton college .
retriever tui is being trained by researcher emily howard-williams , who is studying the decline of harvest mice in the uk .
author: Helen Burchell
BBC News Online

documents.title: cygnet saved in oundle : rspca issue 'take care ' warning
text: rspca inspectors are urging people to take extra care when around wildlife , after a cygnet with metal lodged in its throat was rescued at the weekend .
rspca inspector polly underwood , who attended incident on sunday , said : it was a two-inch , very thin rod of metal which had pierced the skin on his neck .
we are hopeful that he will make a full recovery and will be returned to the wild very soon . ''

documents.title: cobblers ' corry to have scan on knee injury
text: cobblers boss chris wilder has confirmed that midfielder paul corry has gone for a scan on a knee injury up in training .
wilder said : these things happen in training , it 's a contact sport and we have to train how we play .
we will wait for the results of the scan but it 's a disappointing one for us and for the player . ''
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : gasification plant approved northants struggle against the rain
text: these are the afternoon headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cygnet with metal lodged in throat is rescued by rspca
text: a cygnet which had a small piece of metal lodged in its throat is expected to make a good recovery after being rescued by the rspca .
the society was called on sunday after members of the public saw the young swan struggling to swallow at oundle wharf in station road , oundle .

documents.title: northants cricket : rain looks set to remain
text: there 's been no play so far in northamptonshire 's final county championship match of the season , against surrey at the oval .
the forecast suggests there might not be much play to come either .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: long stretches of roadworks on motorways could be restricted
text: many of us are painfully aware of the miles of roadworks on the m1 through northamptonshire .
but following growing complaints from motorists , it appears that the government is set to restrict the length of roadworks in the future .
transport secretary patrick mcloughlin has reportedly ordered the highways agency to adopt new policies within a year .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton chronicle and echo : county firefighters to appear on bbc quiz show
text: five volunteer firefighters from northamptonshire will pit their wits against some of the most knowledgeable brains in the country on tv next week .

documents.title: gasification plant in corby approved
text: i 've got more information on energy company green power 's successful bid for a gasification plant in corby .

the site on the willow brook industrial estate already had planning permission to turn waste into energy , and following a county council decision earlier today , it will now move forward with its plans to turn waste into gas to generate electricity .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: corby 's community champions to be recognised
text: people from corby who 've gone the extra mile to help others or their community will be recognised at the annual `` spirit of corby '' awards tonight .
the ceremony takes place at the corby cube .
categories include contribution to the arts , a local club or society , or the environment .

documents.title: by-election in burton latimer next month
text: a burton latimer town council by-election will be held on thurs 15 october 2015 .
make sure you 're registered to vote

documents.title: latest headlines : corby gasification plant approved plan to consider reducing motorway roadworks
text: these are the lunchtime headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : no action over white wallaby death
text: police have said they are unable to investigate the death of a white wallaby that was apparently killed by a dog in northamptonshire .

documents.title: inventor 's workshop offers 'honest industry opinion '
text: budding toy inventors from across the county are at whittlebury hall , which is playing host to the 2015 investors workshop .
max ford , from ooba toys , told me : `` even if you do n't get the deal , just to hear people say its fab , and i think you will sell that , is validation . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: scam warning from northamptonshire police
text: people are being warned about a new scam being carried out by someone claiming to be from our crime prevention team -

documents.title: corby gasification plant gets the go ahead
text: in the past hour , northamptonshire county council has approved plans for a gasification plant for the willow brook industrial estate in corby .
the company behind the plans , green power , says the plant will provide `` clean renewable energy '' and produce enough electricity for ten thousand homes .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: the next big thing for christmas 2016 ?
text: while the cream of the county 's inventors are at whittlebury hall near towcester today at the 2015 inventor 's workshop , i thought i 'd try and pitch an idea of my own .
unsurprisingly , my gorilla detector has n't made the cut
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: kingsthorpe college students to judge short story contest
text: students from kingsthorpe college in northampton have been chosen as part of the judging panel for the bbc 's national short story competition .
they will join students from 17 other schools and colleges across the country as `` shadow judges '' to give their views on which story deserves to win .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: breakingcorby gasification plant approved
text: northamptonshire county council has approved a gasification plant for corby .
more to follow

documents.title: northants herald & post : healthwatch northamptonshire investigate hospital a & es
text: healthwatch northamptonshire has been investigating accident and emergency units at the county 's hospitals .

documents.title: inventors workshop offering 'honest feedback '
text: inventors of toys are being encouraged to attend the inventors workshop at whittlebury hall near towcester , but they may be given feedback which could bring them down to earth .
max ford , managing director of ooba toys , said `` we 'll actually give you a honest industry avenue opinion on it .
if you ask your friends and family , the chances are they 'll say it 's lovely . ''
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: open evening at northampton international academy
text: parents wanting to send their children to the largest school in the county can find out more at an open evening later .
the northampton international academy - based at the old royal mail sorting office on barrack road - will open to pupils from next year .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: daventry express : runners celebrate great north run charity success
text: two runners are celebrating raising money for their chosen charities after taking part in the great north run .

documents.title: northampton town 's fan rep quit after # wewantanswers
text: northampton town supporters ' trust 's elected representative on the club 's board decided to leave his post after last week 's # wewantanswers campaignat the oxford united game .
in a statement , mr clark said : i have done my best to create an effective link between the trust and the football club .
but this has proved to be too difficult to achieve in the last few weeks . ''
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: gasification plant plan for corby being discussed
text: councillors are discussing whether to give permission for a corby-based gasification plant , which developers say would power 10,000 homes .
the company , green power , already has planning permission to turn waste into energy on the site at the willowbrook industrial estate , using different methods .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cricket : start of surrey match delayed by rain
text: northants cricket
northantsccc
delayed start down in surrey .
forecast is looking bad for the whole day .
# norvsur
delayed start down in surrey .
forecast is looking bad for the whole day .
# norvsur

documents.title: east stand frustration part of andy clark 's decision to quit northampton town board
text: as the northampton chronicle & echo reported , andy clark , northampton town supporters ' trust representative , has resigned from the board of the club in a statement last night .
the interruption to the work on the east stand has also added to the frustrations of some fans . ''
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: latest headlines : corby gasification decision imminent borough council boundary expansion rejected
text: these are the headlines this morning :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: inventor 's workshop at whittlebury hall
text: some of the county 's most innovative inventors are at whittlebury hall near towcester today at the 2015 inventor 's workshop .
one of the success stories from last year 's event is gillian logan , the founder of kids drawing kit skinny sketcher : a prototype which is now on sale in independent retailers .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton stuck under slow moving rain
text: the county is currently stuck under an area of slow moving rain with some heavy bursts mixed in .

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : fans ' representative resigns from board of northampton town
text: the representative of fans on the board of northampton town has resigned citing difficulties creating an effective link between supporters and the club .

documents.title: boundary change plan sought to address income issues
text: a plan to extend the boundary of northampton borough council , rejected by councillors last night , had aimed to address perceived issues with the west northamptonshire joint core strategy .

opposition labour politicians had argued the strategy is set to cause issues for northampton as much of the development will be placed just outside the borough boundary , meaning the town will face challenges associated with large scale development without benefiting from council tax income .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: borough council expansion plans rejected
text: a proposal to expand the boundary of northampton borough council has been rejected .
oppostion labour councillors on the authority put forward the motion at last night 's full council meeting - but it was n't passed .
some conservative councillors said they supported the sentiment behind the motion , but claimed it was `` undeliverable '' .
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : expect some rain
text: we will see a morning of sunshine and showers , some of which will be heavy .
there 's a risk of thunder and hail , but it will become brighter around the middle of the day .
later this afternoon cloud will spread in from the north with patchy rain in places later this evening .
maximum temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: corby gasification plant decision due
text: a decision on whether to grant permission for a gasification plant in corby is due this morning .
the site , on the willowbrook industrial estate , already has planning permission to turn waste into energy .
those opposed to the plans say there would be too many lorries transporting waste and too much pollution .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: morning headlines : gasification plant decision due boundary plans rejected
text: here are the stories making the news so far :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: hello and welcome to local live in northamptonshire
text: good morning , and welcome to today 's local live for northamptonshire .
over the next 10 hours we 'll do our best to bring you the latest news , sport , travel and weather as it happens .
you can get in touch on our facebook page or via twitter .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News
